name: Stage Lighting Synth
short_description: The Stage Lighting Synth lets you create stage lighting shows with real-life lighting fixtures controlled via DMX.  It is a visual graph editor for creating and controlling stage lighting shows in realtime, and is incredibly easy to extend.
